means: 雄雌同株的，雄雌同体的

word_mean: 雌雄同体的，雌雄同株的：一个体具有典型两性生殖器官的

sentence.Network_en: One factor within the crown of monoecious species is the proximity of male and female flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 雌雄同株树种的树冠内的一个因素,就是雄花和雌花很接近.

sentence.Network_en: A gut is present and most of these flukes are monoecious.
sentence.Network_cn: 肠道存在,这些吸虫的大多数是雌雄同体的.

sentence.Network_en: Spadix rachis flat, margin with bract - like appendages; flowers small, monoecious, in 2 series on rachis, apetalous.
sentence.Network_cn: 肉穗花序轴扁平, 边缘有苞片状附属物; 花小, 单性,雌雄同株, 呈2列排列于花序轴上, 无花被.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 雌雄同株（Monoecious）植物既有雄花又有雌花，甚至在同一朵花上既有雄蕊，又有雌蕊。在这种情况下，自花授粉可能由于几种情 …

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from modern Latin Monoecia (denoting a class of such plants in Linnaeus's system), from Greek monos 'single' + oikos 'house'

means.word_mean: 1. having male and female reproductive organs in the same plant or animal

auth_sentence.content: Most species are monoecious - they have separate male and female cones on the same tree.
